thread.title: One Source Networks Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List
thread.title_full: One Source Networks Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List

author: admin
title: One Source Networks Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: One Source Networks 
AUSTIN, TX -- (Marketwired) -- 09/28/15 -- One Source Networks (OSN) , the UCC , managed network and technology life cycle services partner of choice to large global enterprises, announced today that it has been named to The Channel Company's 2015 CRN ® Fast Growth 150 list. Based on gross revenue over the two-year period from 2012 to 2014, The Fast Growth 150 list ranks solution providers based in North America with significant economic growth. In a turbulent IT economy, these companies have shown exceptional prowess in growing their operations and constantly providing essential services to their customers. 
One Source Networks backs its comprehensive suite of solutions with a global next-generation network and a comprehensive service delivery model. The company has expanded significantly over the past few years -- launching new global PoPs in North America, South America, Asia, Australia and Europe -- and bringing innovative services to market, such as its Cloud Lync Enterprise - Skype for Business offering. 
"We are honored to be named to the CRN Fast Growth 150 list," said Gina Nomellini, chief marketing officer, One Source Networks. "This accolade is a testament to OSN's rapid growth across people, processes and services, as well as our commitment to delivering innovative solutions that drive efficiency and productivity organization-wide." 
"Cloud computing, mobile and big data technologies are making the industry both more exciting and more challenging than it's ever been," says Robert Faletra, CEO of The Channel Company. "Solution providers recognized in CRN's Fast Growth 150 list are rising to meet the challenge and are thriving as a result. We are pleased to recognize these firms as leaders in today's IT channel." 
The Fast Growth 150 list is highlighted in the October issue of CRN and can be viewed online at http://crn.com/fastgrowth . 
About One Source Networks One Source Networks (OSN) is a leading managed communications partner to the world's largest enterprises. From Unified Communications and Collaboration (UCC) to managed network services and technology life cycle management, OSN delivers integrated solutions that revolutionize enterprise communications. Leveraging its expansive global network, unique service model and industry-leading applications, OSN takes the complexity out of communications, providing customers with unparalleled visibility and control of their technology ecosystems. One Source Networks is a five-time winner of the Inc. 500 | 5000 award, which highlights America's fastest-growing private companies. 
About The Channel Company The Channel Company, with established brands including CRN®, XChange® Events and IPED®, is the channel community's trusted authority for growth and innovation. For more than three decades, we have leveraged our proven and leading-edge platforms to deliver prescriptive sales and marketing solutions for the technology channel. The Channel Company provides Communication, Recruitment, Engagement, Enablement, Demand Generation and Intelligence services to drive technology partnerships. Learn more at www.thechannelcompany.com .
